text:
Hi All, I am making a Medium publication for Julia and Machine Learning and looking if anyone wants to contribute and/or if any one has any advice ? (Also I am not sure if this goes to general or random, pleae let me know and I move the post)
 <https://medium.com/mljulia>

attachments.title: MLJulia
attachments.text: Julia Programming Language and its usage mostly focused on Machine learning

elements.text: Hi All, I am making a Medium publication for Julia and Machine Learning and looking if anyone wants to contribute and/or if any one has any advice ? (Also I am not sure if this goes to general or random, pleae let me know and I move the post)

text: You didn't ask but I would advise against Medium. Medium is really anti open web and is making it hard for readers to get your content unless they sign up.

elements.text: You didn't ask but I would advise against Medium. Medium is really anti open web and is making it hard for readers to get your content unless they sign up.

text: <@U017E1DLS6B> I understand your point but a good workaround is [this](<https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/medium-unlimited-read-for-free/|https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/medium-unlimited-read-for-free/>) plugin that I use currently.

text: Right, but that's missing the point. That's how as a reader you can circumvent their shitty business model. As a publisher you're still forcing readers and potential readers en large to use a platform that's fundamentally against an open web.

elements.text: Right, but that's missing the point. That's how as a reader you can circumvent their shitty business model. As a publisher you're still forcing readers and potential readers en large to use a platform that's fundamentally against an open web.
